verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra Fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֵּחָ֔ת <S%H2865><s%> te-Chat, not neither be thou dismayed קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> kach take עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha, with אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war וְק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> ve-Kum with thee and arise עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh go up הָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai; to Ai רְאֵ֣ה׀ <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh see נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti I have given בְיָדְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-de-Cha, into thy hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king הָעַי֙ <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai of Ai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo, and his people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עִיר֖וֹ <S%H5892><s%> i-Ro and his city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo. and his land

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt do לָעַ֜י <S%H5857><s%> la-'Ai to Ai וּלְמַלְכָּ֗הּ <S%H4428><s%> u-le-mal-Kah, and her king כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you עָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta as thou didst לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> li-ri-Cho unto Jericho וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <S%H4428><s%> u-le-mal-Kah, and her king רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> rak- its שְׁלָלָ֥הּ <S%H7998><s%> she-la-Lah only the spoil וּבְהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <S%H929><s%> u-ve-hem-Tah thereof and the cattle תָּבֹ֣זּוּ <S%H962><s%> ta-Voz-zu thereof shall ye take for a prey לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; שִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> sim- unto yourselves lay לְךָ֥ le-Cha אֹרֵ֛ב <S%H693><s%> 'o-Rev thee an ambush לָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir for the city מֵאַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rei-ha. behind

וַיָּ֧קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' So Joshua וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah of war לַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> la-'a-Lot to go up הָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai; against Ai וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> vai-yiv-Char chose out יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <S%H3091><s%> Ye-ho-shu-a' and Joshua שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei mighty הַחַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> ha-Cha-yil, of valour וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֖ם <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-la-Chem and sent them away לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah. by night

וַיְצַ֨ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav And he commanded אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, them saying רְ֠אוּ <S%H7200><s%> Re-'u Behold אַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you אֹרְבִ֤ים <S%H693><s%> 'o-re-Vim ye shall lie in wait לָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir against the city מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rei [even] behind הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, the city אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּרְחִ֥יקוּ <S%H7368><s%> tar-Chi-ku far מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir from the city מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; not very וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> vih-yi-Tem become כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-le-Chem all נְכֹנִֽים׃ <S%H3559><s%> ne-cho-Nim. but be ye all ready

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, I וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And I and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתִּ֔י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti, for נִקְרַ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> nik-Rav that [are] with me will approach אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; unto the city וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- and when יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> ye-tze-'U and it shall come to pass when they come out לִקְרָאתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Te-nu against כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah, us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <S%H5127><s%> ve-Nas-nu that we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem. before

וְיָצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-tze-'U (For they will come out אַחֲרֵ֗ינוּ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-nu, after עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until הַתִּיקֵ֤נוּ <S%H5423><s%> hat-ti-Ke-nu us) till we have drawn אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, them from the city כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru, for they will say נָסִ֣ים <S%H5127><s%> na-Sim They flee לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-nu, before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher us בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah; us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <S%H5127><s%> ve-Nas-nu therefore we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem. before

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem, and you תָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> ta-Ku-mu Then ye shall rise up מֵהָ֣אוֹרֵ֔ב <S%H693><s%> me-Ha-'o-Rev, from the ambush וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֖ם <S%H3423><s%> ve-ho-rash-Tem and seize אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; upon the city וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-ta-Nah will deliver יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-yed-Chem. it into your hand

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כְּתָפְשְׂכֶ֣ם <S%H8610><s%> ke-ta-fe-se-Chem And it shall be when ye have taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, the city תַּצִּ֤יתוּ <S%H3341><s%> tatz-Tzi-tu [that] ye shall set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir the city בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, on fire כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; shall ye do רְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> re-'U See צִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti I have commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-la-Chem therefore sent them forth יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', Joshua וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <S%H3993><s%> ham-ma'-Rav, to lie in ambush וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu, and abode בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> bein between בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֛ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הָעַ֖י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai and Ai מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam on the west side לָעָ֑י <S%H5857><s%> la-'Ai; of Ai וַיָּ֧לֶן <S%H3885><s%> vai-Ya-len lodged יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' but Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-Lay-lah that night הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. the people

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem rose up early יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיִּפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> vai-yif-Kod and numbered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; the people וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al and went up ה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְזִקְנֵ֧י <S%H2205><s%> ve-zik-Nei he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai. to Ai

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah [even the people] of war אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for עָלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu that [were] with him went up וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-ge-Shu, and drew nigh וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged front הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; before the city וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched מִצְּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tze-Fon on the north side לָעַ֔י <S%H5857><s%> la-'Ai, of Ai וְהַגַּ֖י <S%H1516><s%> ve-hag-Gai now [there was] a valley; בֵּינֹו bei-nov כבֵּינָ֥יו <S%H996><s%> bei-Nav between קוּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> u-vein- between הָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai. between them and Ai

וַיִּקַּ֕ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he took כַּחֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> ka-cha-Me-shet about five אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; men וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and set אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam אֹרֵ֗ב <S%H693><s%> 'o-Rev, them to lie in ambush בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> bein between בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֛ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הָעַ֖י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai and Ai מִיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam on the west side לָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir. of the city

וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu And when they had set הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, [even] all the host אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that was מִצְּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tze-Fon that [was] on the north לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir, of the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֲקֵב֖וֹ <S%H6119><s%> a-ke-Vo and their liers in wait מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam on the west לָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir; of the city וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech spent יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-Lay-lah that night הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch into the midst הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> ha-'E-mek. of the valley

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כִּרְא֣וֹת <S%H7200><s%> kir-'ot saw מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And it came to pass when the king הָעַ֗י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai, of Ai וַֽיְמַהֲר֡וּ <S%H4116><s%> vay-ma-ha-Ru [it] that they hasted וַיַּשְׁכִּ֡ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Ki-mu and rose up early וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-tze-'U went out אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H582><s%> 'an-shei- and the men הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city לִקְרַֽאת־ <S%H7125><s%> lik-rat- against יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el Israel לַֽמִּלְחָמָ֞ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all עַמּ֛וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo he and all his people לַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> lam-mo-'Ed at a time appointed לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H6160><s%> ha-'a-ra-Vah; the plain וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da', but he wist כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֹרֵ֥ב <S%H693><s%> 'o-Rev not that [there were] liers in ambush ל֖וֹ lo מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rei against him behind הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. the city
